descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][i][font=Trebuchet MS]Cerridwen does not know much about her past... She does know she was brought to the honorhall orphanage when she was very young and its where she [/font][/i][center][i][font=Trebuchet MS]has spent most of her life. Cerridwen now does not live in the orphanage anymore but has joined the thieves guild.
[/font][/i][i][font=Trebuchet MS]Cerridwen yearns to leave Riften to go and adventure and is willing to follow anyone will is willing to take her. 
[/font][/i][font=Trebuchet MS][i](there is my horrible backstory Enjoy!)[/i]
[/font][color=#d5a6bd]

Name: Cerridwen 
[/color][color=#d5a6bd]Age: 19
[/color][color=#d5a6bd]Location: The Bee and barb Riften
 [/color][color=#d5a6bd]Class: Mage
 [/color][color=#d5a6bd]She levels up with the player
[/color][color=#d5a6bd]You are able to marry her
 [/color][color=#d5a6bd]She Primarily uses lightning magic
[/color][color=#d5a6bd]Comes with the light foot perk so she won't trigger traps[/color][img]http://i.imgur.com/FFyvErh.png[/img][font=Georgia][color=#c9daf8][size=4]Permissions/credits
